title: Oil Price Generator
creator: Bruno St-Aubin
description: This atomic model periodically generates a new oil price that is propagated to linked models.
subject: oil

simple
economic

state.description: This model only holds the current oil price in its state

title: GDP Cell
creator: Bruno St-Aubin
description: This atomic model represents a grid cell of 1km by 1 km in Alberta. It calculates GDP with a linear regression formula based on historic GST and oil prices. GST is used as a proxy for GDP.
subject: oil
gis
simple
economic

state.description: This model stores the current price of an oil barrel and the current GDP (GST) calculation.

field.name: barrel price
field.description: The current price of an oil barrel

field.name: GDP (GST)
field.description: GST for the cell given the current oil barrel price

field.name: month over month change
field.description: Month over month change in GDP (GST)

field.name: month over month growth rate
field.description: Month over month GDP (GST) growth rate

field.name: barrel price
field.description: The current price of an oil barrel
